jnxIfOpticsMib.name: jnxIfOpticsMib

revisions.description: Added Optics Config, Alarms and PM data.

jnxIfOpticsMib.contactinfo: Juniper Technical Assistance Center Juniper Networks, Inc. 1194 N. Mathilda Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: support@juniper.net
jnxIfOpticsMib.description: This MIB module defines objects used for managing the Optics interface for Juniper products.

JnxOpticsDirection.name: JnxOpticsDirection
JnxOpticsDirection.description: Indicates the direction as Rx/Tx or bi-directional.

JnxOpticsServiceStateAction.name: JnxOpticsServiceStateAction
JnxOpticsServiceStateAction.description: Notification's action on the service state

JnxOpticsChannelSpacing.name: JnxOpticsChannelSpacing
JnxOpticsChannelSpacing.description: Channel spacing 1 - 100 Ghz 2 - 50 GHz 3 - 25 GHz 4 - 12.5 GHz 5 - 6.25 Ghz

jnxOpticsConfigTable.name: jnxOpticsConfigTable
jnxOpticsConfigTable.description: Information about the optics config Table.

jnxOpticsConfigEntry.name: jnxOpticsConfigEntry
jnxOpticsConfigEntry.description: A conceptual row that contains information about the optics config Table.

jnxOpticsConfigL1Index.name: jnxOpticsConfigL1Index
jnxOpticsConfigL1Index.description: The level one index associated with this subject ... eg fpc slot.

jnxOpticsConfigL2Index.name: jnxOpticsConfigL2Index
jnxOpticsConfigL2Index.description: The level two index associated with this subject .. eg pic slot.

jnxOpticsConfigL3Index.name: jnxOpticsConfigL3Index
jnxOpticsConfigL3Index.description: The level three index associated with this subject.. eg port.

jnxOpticsType.name: jnxOpticsType
jnxOpticsType.description: 0 - none 1 - SFP 2 - XFP 3 - SFP+ 4 - XFP+ 5 - CFP 6 - CFP+ 7 - Non pluggable

jnxWavelength.name: jnxWavelength
jnxWavelength.description: The transmit wavelength of the laser.

jnxSpacing.name: jnxSpacing
jnxSpacing.description: A minimum nominal difference in frequency (GHz) between two adjacent channels.

jnxModulation.name: jnxModulation
jnxModulation.description: Modulation Unknown - (1), NonPSK - (2), ODB - (3), DPSK - (4), QPSK - (5), DQPSK - (6), DPQPSK - (7), 16QAM - (8), 64QAM - (9), 256QAM - (10)

jnxModuleTempHighThresh.name: jnxModuleTempHighThresh
jnxModuleTempHighThresh.description: High module temerature in degree fahrenheit for a 15 minute period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxModuleTempLowThresh.name: jnxModuleTempLowThresh
jnxModuleTempLowThresh.description: Low module temerature in degree fahrenheit for a 15 minute period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxTxPowerHighThresh.name: jnxTxPowerHighThresh
jnxTxPowerHighThresh.description: Tx power for a 15 minute period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxTxPowerLowThresh.name: jnxTxPowerLowThresh
jnxTxPowerLowThresh.description: Tx Power for a 15 minute period below which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxRxPowerHighThresh.name: jnxRxPowerHighThresh
jnxRxPowerHighThresh.description: Rx power for a 15 minute period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxRxPowerLowThresh.name: jnxRxPowerLowThresh
jnxRxPowerLowThresh.description: Rx Power for a 15 minute period below which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourModuleTempHighThresh.name: jnx24HourModuleTempHighThresh
jnx24HourModuleTempHighThresh.description: High module temerature in degree fahrenheit for a 24 hour period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourModuleTempLowThresh.name: jnx24HourModuleTempLowThresh
jnx24HourModuleTempLowThresh.description: Low module temerature in degree fahrenheit for a 24 hour period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourTxPowerHighThresh.name: jnx24HourTxPowerHighThresh
jnx24HourTxPowerHighThresh.description: Tx power for a 24 hour period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourTxPowerLowThresh.name: jnx24HourTxPowerLowThresh
jnx24HourTxPowerLowThresh.description: Tx for a 24 hour period Power below which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourRxPowerHighThresh.name: jnx24HourRxPowerHighThresh
jnx24HourRxPowerHighThresh.description: Rx power for a 24 hour period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourRxPowerLowThresh.name: jnx24HourRxPowerLowThresh
jnx24HourRxPowerLowThresh.description: Rx Power for a 24 hour period below which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxRxLosPowerWarningThresh.name: jnxRxLosPowerWarningThresh
jnxRxLosPowerWarningThresh.description: Rx Power warning threshold for seeting the optical LOS warning.

jnxRxLosPowerAlarmThresh.name: jnxRxLosPowerAlarmThresh
jnxRxLosPowerAlarmThresh.description: Rx Power alarm threshold for seeting the optical LOS warning.

jnxTxPowerHighEnableTCA.name: jnxTxPowerHighEnableTCA
jnxTxPowerHighEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Tx Power High TCA.

jnxTxPowerLowEnableTCA.name: jnxTxPowerLowEnableTCA
jnxTxPowerLowEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Tx Power Low TCA.

jnxRxPowerHighEnableTCA.name: jnxRxPowerHighEnableTCA
jnxRxPowerHighEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Rx Power High TCA.

jnxRxPowerLowEnableTCA.name: jnxRxPowerLowEnableTCA
jnxRxPowerLowEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Rx Power Low TCA.

jnxModuleTempHighEnableTCA.name: jnxModuleTempHighEnableTCA
jnxModuleTempHighEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Module Temp High TCA.

jnxModuleTempLowEnableTCA.name: jnxModuleTempLowEnableTCA
jnxModuleTempLowEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Module Temp Low TCA.

jnxCarFreqOffsetHighEnableTCA.name: jnxCarFreqOffsetHighEnableTCA
jnxCarFreqOffsetHighEnableTCA.description: Enable/Disable for the Carrier Frequency Offset High TCA.

jnxCarFreqOffsetHighThresh.name: jnxCarFreqOffsetHighThresh
jnxCarFreqOffsetHighThresh.description: Carrier frequency offset for a 15 minute period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetHighThresh.name: jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetHighThresh
jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetHighThresh.description: Carrier frequency offset for a 24 Hour period above which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxCarFreqOffsetLowThresh.name: jnxCarFreqOffsetLowThresh
jnxCarFreqOffsetLowThresh.description: Carrier frequency offset for a 15 minute period Low which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetLowThresh.name: jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetLowThresh
jnx24HourCarFreqOffsetLowThresh.description: Carrier frequency offset for a 24 Hour period Low which a Threshold Crossing Alert (TCA) should be sent. Only one TCA will be sent per period .

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL1Index.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL1Index
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL1Index.description: The level one index associated with this subject ... eg fpc slot.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL2Index.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL2Index
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL2Index.description: The level two index associated with this subject .. eg pic slot.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL3Index.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL3Index
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgL3Index.description: The level three index associated with this subject.. eg port.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxEnable.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxEnable
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxEnable.description: This will enable/disable the transmit Trace tone feature.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxEnable.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxEnable
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxEnable.description: This will enable/disable the receive Trace tone feature.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgDestId.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgDestId
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgDestId.description: This is the destination Id of the link ID/ the chassis and the blade. The transmit messages will also have the src id which is this chassis id and this port info.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxMsg.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxMsg
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgTxMsg.description: This will be the transmit data in the tracetone message.

jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxMsg.name: jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxMsg
jnxOpticsTraceToneCfgRxMsg.description: This will be the receive data in the trace tone message.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtime.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtimeUp
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtime.description: This object will indicate the time (ms) for the defect to persist before it is declared an alarm.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtime.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtimeDown
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigDefaultHoldtime.description: This object will indicate the time (ms) for the defect to absent before the alarm is cleared.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigTable.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigTable
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigTable.description: Information about the otn Alarm/Alart/Info trigger table.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigEntry.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigEntry
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigEntry.description: A conceptual row that contains information about the Otn Alarm Trigger Table.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL1Index.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL1Index
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL1Index.description: The level one index associated with this subject ... eg fpc slot.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL2Index.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL2Index
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL2Index.description: The level two index associated with this subject .. eg pic slot.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL3Index.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL3Index
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigL3Index.description: The level three index associated with this subject.. eg port.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigAlmId.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigAlmId
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigAlmId.description: This will be the type of Alarm as defined by JnxOpticsNotificationId

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigSeverity.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigSeverity
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigSeverity.description: This will be the Severity of the Notification.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigIgnore.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigIgnore
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigIgnore.description: This object will ignore the alarm when set.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeUp.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeUp
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeUp.description: This object will indicate the time (ms) for the defect to persist before it is declared an alarm.

jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeDown.name: jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeDown
jnxOpticsNotificationTrigHoldtimeDown.description: This object will indicate the time (ms) the defect is absent before the alarm is cleared.

jnxOpticsTrigServiceStateAction.name: jnxOpticsTrigServiceStateAction
jnxOpticsTrigServiceStateAction.description: This will indicate whether this alarm is service affecting or not .

jnxOpticsPMCurrentTable.name: jnxOpticsPMCurrentTable
jnxOpticsPMCurrentTable.description: A table of current PM entries.

jnxOpticsPMCurrentEntry.name: jnxOpticsPMCurrentEntry
jnxOpticsPMCurrentEntry.description: A conceptual row that contains information about the PM Current Table.

jnxPMCurChromaticDispersion.name: jnxPMCurChromaticDispersion
jnxPMCurChromaticDispersion.description: Residual Chromatic Dispersion measured at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurPolarDepLoss.name: jnxPMCurPolarDepLoss
jnxPMCurPolarDepLoss.description: The polarisation dependent loss (PDL) is the difference (in dB) between the maximum and minimum values of the channel insertion loss (or gain) of the black-link from point SS to RS due to a variation of the state of polarization (SOP) over all SOPs

jnxPMCurQ.name: jnxPMCurQ
jnxPMCurQ.description: 'Q' factor estimated at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinChromaticDispersion.name: jnxPMCurMinChromaticDispersion
jnxPMCurMinChromaticDispersion.description: Min Residual Chromatic Dispersion measured at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMaxChromaticDispersion.name: jnxPMCurMaxChromaticDispersion
jnxPMCurMaxChromaticDispersion.description: Max Residual Chromatic Dispersion measured at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurAvgChromaticDispersion.name: jnxPMCurAvgChromaticDispersion
jnxPMCurAvgChromaticDispersion.description: Average Residual Chromatic Dispersion measured at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinQ.name: jnxPMCurMinQ
jnxPMCurMinQ.description: Min 'Q' factor estimated at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMaxQ.name: jnxPMCurMaxQ
jnxPMCurMaxQ.description: Max 'Q' factor estimated at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurAvgQ.name: jnxPMCurAvgQ
jnxPMCurAvgQ.description: Avg 'Q' factor estimated at Rx Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinSNR.name: jnxPMCurMinSNR
jnxPMCurMinSNR.description: Min SNR - signal to noise ratio

jnxPMCurMaxSNR.name: jnxPMCurMaxSNR
jnxPMCurMaxSNR.description: Max SNR - signal to noise ratio

jnxPMCurAvgSNR.name: jnxPMCurAvgSNR
jnxPMCurAvgSNR.description: Avg SNR - signal to noise ratio

jnxPMCurSuspectedFlag.name: jnxPMCurSuspectedFlag
jnxPMCurSuspectedFlag.description: If true, the data in this entry may be unreliable.

jnxPMCurSuspectReason.name: jnxPMCurSuspectReason
jnxPMCurSuspectReason.description: If SuspectedFlag is true, the reson for the PM data being suspect. 0 - not applicable 1 - unknown 2 - new object 3 - interface disabled 4 - clock shift detected 5 - cleared by user 6 - interval too short secs < 890 7 - interval too long secs > 910 8 - near end unavailable 9 - far end unavailable 10 - partial data 11 - missing intervals due to restarts

jnxPMCurTxLaserBiasCurrent.name: jnxPMCurTxLaserBiasCurrent
jnxPMCurTxLaserBiasCurrent.description: Trasmit LaserBiasCurrent measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinTxLaserBiasCurrent.name: jnxPMCurMinTxLaserBiasCurrent
jnxPMCurMinTxLaserBiasCurrent.description: Minimum trasmit LaserBiasCurrent measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMaxTxLaserBiasCurrent.name: jnxPMCurMaxTxLaserBiasCurrent
jnxPMCurMaxTxLaserBiasCurrent.description: Maximum trasmit LaserBiasCurrent measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurAvgTxLaserBiasCurrent.name: jnxPMCurAvgTxLaserBiasCurrent
jnxPMCurAvgTxLaserBiasCurrent.description: Average LaserBiasCurrent measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinTemperature.name: jnxPMCurMinTemperature
jnxPMCurMinTemperature.description: Minimum Temperature measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMaxTemperature.name: jnxPMCurMaxTemperature
jnxPMCurMaxTemperature.description: Maximum Temperature measure at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurAvgTemperature.name: jnxPMCurAvgTemperature
jnxPMCurAvgTemperature.description: Average Temperature measure at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurCarFreqOffset.name: jnxPMCurCarFreqOffset
jnxPMCurCarFreqOffset.description: Carrier frequency offset measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMinCarFreqOffset.name: jnxPMCurMinCarFreqOffset
jnxPMCurMinCarFreqOffset.description: Minimum Carrier frequency offset measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurMaxCarFreqOffset.name: jnxPMCurMaxCarFreqOffset
jnxPMCurMaxCarFreqOffset.description: Maximum Carrier frequency offset measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurAvgCarFreqOffset.name: jnxPMCurAvgCarFreqOffset
jnxPMCurAvgCarFreqOffset.description: Average Carrier frequency offset measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMCurRxLaserBiasCurrent.name: jnxPMCurRxLaserBiasCurrent
jnxPMCurRxLaserBiasCurrent.description: Received LaserBiasCurrent measured at Transceiver port

jnxPMDaySuspectReason.name: jnxPMDaySuspectReason
jnxPMDaySuspectReason.description: If SuspectedFlag is true, the reson for the PM data being suspect. 0 - not applicable 1 - unknown 2 - new object 3 - interface disabled 4 - clock shift detected 5 - cleared by user 6 - partial data 7 - one or more intervals are invaild
